articles.description: JJ Redick will formally interview for the Lakers' coaching job this weekend, and a strong performance is expected to move him to the forefront of the franchise's search, sources told ESPN.
articles.content: JJ Redick will formally interview for the Los Angeles Lakers' coaching job this weekend, and a strong performance is expected to move him to the forefront of the franchise's search, sources told ESPN… [+1417 chars]
